short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A CodeForces extension to quickly pick up a problem and solve it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to quickly pick up an unsolved problem with selected difficulty, allowing you to spend more time on solving tasks, rather than selecting them. It also (optionally) starts a timer, allowing you to practice solving tasks faster.
